calculation.formula:
// This is a if statement // It groups the opportunities by number of days until close date
IF [Calculation_1065382853526470657]>= 0 AND [Calculation_1065382853526470657]<= 15 THEN "Next 15 days" ELSEIF [Calculation_1065382853526470657]>15 AND [Calculation_1065382853526470657]<=30 THEN "Next 16-30 days" ELSEIF [Calculation_1065382853526470657]>30 AND [Calculation_1065382853526470657]<=60 THEN "Next 31-60 days" ELSEIF [Calculation_1065382853526470657]>60 AND [Calculation_1065382853526470657]<=90 THEN "Next 61-90 days" ELSEIF [Calculation_1065382853526470657]>90 THEN "More than 90 days" ELSE "Lost Close Date" END
